data.name: Futuristic Museum
data.detailed_description:
Futuristic Museum is a virtual reality museum where you can see and experience future museums with various themes. Try various experiences at home, such as mysterious and beautiful spaces, and exhibits you can touch!

Futuristic Museum consists of a lobby and three exhibitions related to each subject. Each exhibit is a mineral, an aquarium, and a statue.

Lobby
* In the lobby, there are tutorials on how to operate and a portal to each exhibition.


Mineral exhibition
* In the mineral exhibition hall, you can see and touch various minerals.


Aquarium
* In the aquarium, you can see aquatic creatures and play rock climbing mini-games.


Statue exhibition
* In the statue exhibition hall, you can see and touch information about oriental statues.


Info
* You can view information about the exhibits by clicking the information button next to each exhibition stand.
* By pressing the button on your wrist, you can open the mini-map of the current exhibition hall and a menu that allows you to move to the desired place.

data.short_description: You can see the museum of the future through VR. Touch, feel and experience mysterious places with various themes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 7/8/10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
